Headline: #37 Sedgwick Temporary Northbound Reroute near Canal/Harrison
ShortDescription: NB 37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Clinton, Harrison, Jefferson, and Jackson due to, water department construction near Canal/Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Clinton, Harrison, Jefferson, and Jackson due to, water department construction near Canal/Harrison.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison, #157 Streeterville/Taylor, #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Canal/Harrison
ShortDescription: EB 7 Harrison, 157 Streeterville/Taylor, and 60 Blue Island/26th buses temp. rerouted via Harrison, Jefferson, Jackson, and Canal, near Canal/Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #7 Harrison, #157 Streeterville/Taylor, #60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Jefferson, Jackson, and Canal, due to water department construction near Canal/Harrison.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between Jackson and Pulaski
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Jackson and Pulaski due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Jackson and Pulaski due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between O'Hare and Jackson, and,
  • between Pulaski and Forest Park, only.

 Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
